name: Fantatron
overview: Fantatron\Enemy Soldiers is a game that allows you to display on your screen an epic battle against platoons of enemy soldiers, firing your cannon at them from the lower part of the screen as they attack from above. The fast action can be had with either joystick or keyboard controls. As you progress in the action the soldiers get closer and closer to your ship, hurling more and more bombs at you. Create a passage through by taking down as many of the enemy as possible. If you survive the battle, tougher opponents will follow.
